turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey I was wondering if you can order a drink from Starbucks for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which Starbucks would you like the order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The starbucks on Knapp in Grand Rapids.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a caffe latte, iced please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will take a tall

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay would you like anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No that is it. I want it made with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay sure, I will get it ordered for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, use my account and credit card please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay do you want me to grab it for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will grab it. Use my account with credit card.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay sure

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It is ordered for you at Starbucks on Knapp.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay did you get a receipt?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It will be sent to you via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome
